TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ExpandCollapsePattern extends System.Windows.Automation.BasePattern

summary.span: 表示以可视化方式展开显示内容，折叠隐藏内容的控件。

span.span: Represents controls that visually expand to display content and collapse to hide content.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 聚合控件-用提供用于展开/折叠功能的 UI 的子对象生成-必须支持 控件模式，而其子元素不支持。Aggregate controls - built with child objects that provide the UI for expand/collapse functionality - must support the control pattern while their child elements do not. 例如，组合框控件是由列表框、按钮和编辑控件组合而成的，但它是唯一一个必须支持 的父组合框。For example, a combo box control is built with a combination of list box, button, and edit controls, but it is only the parent combo box that must support the . > [!NOTE] > 即使单个菜单项的聚合，菜单控件也是此规则的例外情况。A menu control, even though an aggregate of individual menu items, is an exception to this rule. 菜单项支持 控件模式，但父菜单控件不支持。The menu items support the control pattern, but the parent menu control does not. 类似的异常适用于树和树项控件。A similar exception applies to the tree and tree item controls.

span.span: A structure containing the cached [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for the control pattern.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 已缓存的属性值之前必须使用 进行请求。Cached property values must have been previously requested using a . 使用 获取属性的当前值。Use to get the current value of a property. 有关可用属性及其用法的信息，请参阅 。For information on the properties available and their use, see .

exception.span: 请求的属性不在缓存中。

span.span: The requested property is not in the cache.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Collapse() cil managed

summary.span: 隐藏 的所有子代节点、控件或内容。

span.span: Hides all descendant nodes, controls, or content of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是一个阻止方法，该方法在 UI 自动化元素折叠后返回。This is a blocking method that returns after the UI Automation element has been collapsed. 有些情况下，标记为叶节点的 UI 自动化元素在调用 或 方法之前可能不知道它是否具有子级。There are cases when a UI Automation element that is marked as a leaf node might not know whether it has children until either the or the method is called. 此行为可用于执行延迟加载其子项的树视图控件。This behavior is possible with a tree view control that does delayed loading of its child items. 例如，[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winexpl](~/includes/tlasharptla-winexpl-md.md)] 可能会显示节点的展开图标，即使当前没有子项;单击图标时，控件将轮询子项，查找无，并删除展开图标。For example, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winexpl](~/includes/tlasharptla-winexpl-md.md)] might display the expand icon for a node even though there are currently no child items; when the icon is clicked, the control polls for child items, finds none, and removes the expand icon. 在这些情况下，客户端应通过使用 方法注册事件处理程序来侦听 属性上的属性更改事件。In these cases clients should listen for a property-changed event on the property by registering an event handler with the method. ## Examples 在下面的示例中，表示菜单项的 UI 自动化元素会传递到一个函数，该函数根据菜单项的当前 来尝试展开或折叠菜单项。In the following example, a UI Automation element representing a menu item is passed to a function that attempts to expand or collapse the menu item based on its current . [!code-csharp[UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snip/CSharp/UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snippets.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snippets.vb#101)] [!code-csharp[UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snip/CSharp/UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snippets.cs#102)] [!code-vb[UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snippets.vb#102)]

span.span: A structure containing the current [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for the control pattern.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此模式必须来自具有 引用的 ，才能获取当前值。This pattern must be from an with an reference in order to get current values. 如果 是使用 获取的，则它只包含缓存的数据，尝试获取任何属性的当前值会引发异常。If the was obtained using , it contains only cached data, and attempting to get the current value of any property raises an exception. 使用 获取以前使用 指定的属性的已缓存值。Use to get the cached value of a property that was previously specified using a . 有关可用属性及其用法的信息，请参阅 。For information on the properties available and their use, see .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Expand() cil managed

summary.span: 显示 的全部子节点、控件或内容。

span.span: Displays all child nodes, controls, or content of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是在 展开后返回的阻止方法。This is a blocking method that returns after the has been expanded. 有些情况下，标记为叶节点的 在调用 或 方法之前可能不知道其是否具有子级。There are cases when a that is marked as a leaf node might not know whether it has children until either the or the method is called. 此行为可用于执行延迟加载其子项的树视图控件。This behavior is possible with a tree view control that does delayed loading of its child items. 例如，[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winexpl](~/includes/tlasharptla-winexpl-md.md)] 可能会显示节点的展开图标，即使当前没有子项;单击图标时，控件将轮询子项，查找无，并删除展开图标。For example, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winexpl](~/includes/tlasharptla-winexpl-md.md)] might display the expand icon for a node even though there are currently no child items; when the icon is clicked, the control polls for child items, finds none, and removes the expand icon. 在这些情况下，客户端应通过使用 方法注册事件处理程序来侦听 属性上的属性更改事件。In these cases clients should listen for a property-changed event on the property by registering an event handler with the method. ## Examples 在下面的示例中，将表示菜单项的 传递到一个函数，该函数根据菜单项的当前 尝试对其进行扩展或折叠。In the following example, an representing a menu item is passed to a function that attempts to expand or collapse the menu item based on its current . [!code-csharp[UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snip/CSharp/UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snippets.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snippets.vb#101)] [!code-csharp[UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snip/CSharp/UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snippets.cs#102)] [!code-vb[UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snippets.vb#102)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly ExpandCollapseStateProperty As AutomationProperty

span.span: Identifies the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此标识符由 UI 自动化客户端应用程序使用。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI 自动化提供程序应在 中使用等效字段。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . 仅表示直接子对象的可见性，而不表示所有后代对象的可见性。 refers to the visibility of immediate child objects only; it does not refer to the visibility of all descendant objects. 默认值是 。The default value is . ## Examples 在下面的示例中，将一个根元素传递到一个函数，该函数返回 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 元素的集合，这些元素是根的后代并且满足一组属性条件。In the following example, a root element is passed to a function that returns a collection of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elements that are descendants of the root and satisfy a set of property conditions. [!code-csharp[UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snip#100](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snip/CSharp/UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snippets.cs#100)] [!code-vb[UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snip#100](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snippets.vb#100)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Pattern As AutomationPattern

span.span: Identifies the control pattern.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此标识符由 UI 自动化客户端应用程序使用。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI 自动化提供程序应在 中使用等效字段。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . 模式 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] 传递给方法，如 ，以从指定的 检索相关的控件模式。The pattern [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] is passed to methods such as to retrieve the control pattern of interest from the specified . ## Examples 在下面的示例中，从 UI 自动化元素获取 控件模式。In the following example, a control pattern is obtained from a UI Automation element. [!code-csharp[UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snip/CSharp/UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snippets.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snippets.vb#101)]
